name: Time Crust
description:
Unravel the world that is collapsing due to a mineral that has the power to change time.

In this world, you are part of this time-changing mineral and your goal is to find the source of energy that is confusing the present with the past.

Game developed for FAESA Game Jam 02 2020/1

Team:

  • Eduardo Tolentino
  • Arthur Manhães

Gameplay:

Recommended to download the game for better performance.
